name: productmicroservice
description: 1. We need to download the free community edition of Mongo DB

scripts.docker-local-dev-build: cross-env TARGETENV=dev docker compose --env-file docker/environments/local.env  -p product-node-express-dev -f docker/docker-compose.local.yml -f docker/docker-compose.dev.override.yml  build
scripts.docker-local-dev-up: cross-env TARGETENV=dev docker compose --env-file docker/environments/local.env -p product-node-express-dev -f docker/docker-compose.local.yml -f docker/docker-compose.dev.override.yml up -d --remove-orphans --no-build --scale product-node=3
scripts.docker-local-prod-up: cross-env TARGETENV=prod docker compose --env-file docker/environments/local.env -p product-node-express-prod -f docker/docker-compose.local.yml -f docker/docker-compose.prod.override.yml up -d --remove-orphans --no-build
